From 20 December 2016 until further notice,
consultant to LionTree LLC, 660 Madison Avenue,
New York, NY 10065. I provide general analysis of
European telecom, media and technology sector
developments, and host seminars and events. From 1
October 2017, I will be paid a monthly retainer of
£6,333 plus VAT and related expenses. Hours:
approx. 32 hrs per month. I consulted ACoBA about
this appointment.

International eGames Committee, c/o International
Group Management Limited, Stoke Park Road, Stoke
Poges, Bucks SL2 4PG, a board established to
promote international competition in e-sports. I
received a monthly fee of £2,083 for this role,
plus related expenses. Hours: approx. 8 hrs per
month. I consulted ACoBA about this appointment.
